skillTree.localised_description: When muscles reknit and bones mend, there is little need to consider ones own safety.
The life overflows from within, impossible to quell or stem, the only recourse is rampant action.
The Warriors of Chaos are the playthings of Gods and given many gifts, including formidable fighting skills.
The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.
Once a knight of the Empire, Aekold desires nothing more than to return to those who betrayed him and show them the truth of the worldâ€¦

effects.description: Diplomatic relations: +20 with Chaos Dwarfs, Warriors of Chaos and Norsca
Passive ability: "Frenzy" when fighting against Empire

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

effects.description:
Attribute: Causes Terror when fighting against Empire
	(Hero's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

skillTree.localised_description: Aekold wields the Windblade, a greatsword that can fly through the air to scythe down the foe, or empower Aekold himself to strike with the swiftness of the wind!

effects.description: Enables "Windstruck" contact effect (reduced Speed and acceleration)

ui_effects.localised_text: Spawns a moving area of effect

skillTree.localised_description: Aekold's new knightly brotherhood has proven far more appreciative of his talents.

effects.description:
Passive ability: "Wreathed in Thorns" for Chaos Knight and Doom Knight units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: â€¦and life goes on and on and on and on and on and on and on and on and on and on and on and on and on...

target_if: Hit point replenishment cap not reached

skillTree.localised_description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, itâ€™s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
When everything else fails, there is always studying the blade. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
Wielding the shield is better than returning on it. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

items.colour_text: One of the Tzeentchâ€™s most mysterious and bizarre gifts, Aekold's body springs new and vigorous growth, constantly restoring his own lifeforce.
Aekoldâ€™s excellent swordsmanship allows him to control this erratic and unpredictable double-handed Tzeentchian broadsword, hurling it at his enemies with devastating results.

ui_effects.localised_text: Spawns a moving area of effect

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Wherever he steps, life sprouts, the branches straining under bushels of overripe fruit, flowers so bright they sear the eyes.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +5%
	(armies in region regardless of ownership)

Winds of Magic cost: -20% for Lore of Life spells
	(armies in region regardless of ownership)

Enemy leadership: -8
	(enemy armies in local province)
